titles.title: A bill to provide for the use of additional funds for transportation projects that were affected by Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19), and for other purposes.
A bill to provide for the use of additional funds for transportation projects that were affected by Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19), and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
This bill directs the Department of Transportation (DOT) to provide additional funding to certain transportation projects that were awarded competitive grants but require additional funds to complete such projects due to the effects of COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).
In providing additional funds, DOT shall provide an amount equal to not less than 10% of the total project costs.
